item.title: Bahama Bucks
item.description: Katie and the gang over at Cheap Thrills invited me and the kids to do a co-review highlighting some of our favorite summer treats. You can check out their submission, Culver’s Frozen Custard, below. Naturally, I jumped at the chance to introduce you guys to one of the hidden treasures of our little neighborhood ‚Äî Bahama Bucks! Bucks is sort of like Jimmy Buffett’s own sno-cone stand. It serves sno-cones and tropical smoothies, some coffee drinks, and you can even get mixed fruit cups there if you’d like.
